job.title: Data Modeler
job.description: Description: The EBDM Model Developer/ Analyst will function as part of the EBDM Model Development team. The role will primarily facilitate ongoing model validation efforts including, but not limited to: writing and executing model code; training, testing and validation of model performance against benchmark methods; data quality assessment; implementation of data preprocessing methods; reproducible workflow design; and documentation of methods, assumptions and outcomes. Analytical focus will provide insights into business processes, derived from model applications and involve communication of technical procedures to a wide audience with varying backgrounds. Required Job Skills: • Proficiency in Python programming and object oriented design • Practical experience with large data analysis with multiple open source programming libraries (pandas, numpy, scikit-learn, scipy, statsmodels, as well as one of tensorflow/keras/pytorch) • Hadoop, Apache Spark • Neo4j and Cypher • General statistics and probability • Time series analysis, forecasting and anomaly detection • Graph analytics/ network science • Hands on advanced statistical modeling and/or machine learning model development in Python • Experience with model design, implementation and evaluation of model performance • Model validation procedures with knowledge of regulatory requirements in industry • Quick learner with capacity for independent judgment and decision making • Advanced Excel Desired Job Skills: • Effective written and oral communication skills, especially in reference to explaining quantitative methodology for audiences of all technical backgrounds • Degree in quantitative discipline involving computer science, engineering or statistics • Jira/Agile • PowerPoint • SharePoint
